svg.title: Decision Sandbox ‚Äî Deep Architecture
svg.desc: The sandbox is the safe experimentation layer where rules are edited without touching production. Luxury Industrial Obsidian theme.
svg.text: Safe Experimentation ‚Ä¢ No-Risk Rule Editing ‚Ä¢ Explicit Disposition ‚Ä¢ Version Control for Decision Logic

g.text: All edits happen here. Production files are never touched until you explicitly save.
Auto-created before any Replace Production operation
Sandbox evaporates. Production unchanged. Session forgotten.
Creates new file alongside production, e.g.:
‚Üí Production untouched, new variant on disk
Overwrites original file. Auto-backup created first.
Download sandbox state as a file for offline analysis
// Clones all config files into memory
‚Üí Full sandbox state as serializable object
üîÑ Edit Flow ‚Äî The Safe Experimentation Loop
3. All pending decisions in the queue are re-evaluated using new rules
4. UI updates: scores change, classifications shift, alternatives rerank
Production files: unchanged. Disk: untouched. Risk: zero.
The chain is the ordered list of which configs/trees are ACTIVE:
DecisionChain.add("my-experiment", pos) ‚Üí Makes it active in the chain
This separation lets you: save experiments, compare side-by-side, promote gradually
Variants can be added/removed from the decision chain independently.
Compare variants side-by-side. Promote good ones. Delete bad ones.
AI agents can manipulate the sandbox via API:
üéØ CORE PRINCIPLES ‚Äî Why the Sandbox Matters
Edit a rule ‚Üí see effect instantly.
No restart, no reload, no wait.
The Sandbox is the safe space where decision logic evolves ‚Äî tested on real data, saved only when proven.
